content: Wood framing circular saw blade Top-performance circular saw blade for wood framing with carbide teeth to cut faster, last longer and maximize your productivity on cordless saws ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Saw blades- - - ### FEATURES:Features Hilti’s ultimate circular saw blades for wood framing, engineered to help you get the job done faster and cut more with the same blade Higher speed, lower vibration – 24 high-density carbide teeth help to saw rapidly and smoothly through timber framing Faster cuts with cordless saws – cut wood framing up to 30% faster by combining these blades with your Hilti cordless circular saw Designed for straight cuts – this framing blade is ideal when you want faster progress in rip, cross or even in bevel cuts More cuts per charge – ultra-thin kerf minimizes energy consumption so you can cut up to 40% more per battery charge Applications Cutting lumber, construction timber, solid wood (hard and soft) Cutting wooden boards (plywood, formwork, OSB, chip) Rip- and cross-cutting Bevel cuts ### TECHNICAL DATA: Blade features: Special for cordless, Long life, Ultra thin kerf technology, Carbide tipped, Straight cut Number of teeth: 24 Product Class: Ultimate Technical Data | Blade features | Special for cordless, Long life, Ultra thin kerf technology, Carbide tipped, Straight cut | Number of teeth | 24 | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2335648 - Circ. saw blade SCBW FR SPX 6-1/2 A (5) - Package Size 5 pc - 2335649 - Circ. saw blade SCBW FR SPX 7-1/4 A (5) - Package Size 5 pc - 3876788 - Circ. Saw FR SPX 7-1/4 Gen 2 (25) - Package Size 1 pc
